document.full_text: california law allows an ex-smoker with lung cancer to sue philip morris usa, even though she filed the case years after she had been diagnosed with a separate smoking-related disease, an appeals court has ruled.
document.title: ex-smoker can sue for later illness: california court
lines_and_colors: california law allows an ex-smoker with lung cancer to sue philip morris usa, even though she filed the case years after she had been diagnosed with a separate smoking-related disease, an appeals court has ruled.
